code: export function forumPostsDesc(a,b){if(a.id>b.id)return-1;if(a.id<b.id)return 1;return 0;}export function forumPostsAsc(a,b){if(a.id<b.id)return-1;if(a.id>b.id)return 1;return 0;}export function sortTimeAsc(a,b){var aTime=a.startTime,bTime=b.startTime;var aHour=+aTime.split(":")[0],bHour=+bTime.split(":")[0];var aMins=+aTime.split(":")[1].slice(0,2),bMins=+bTime.split(":")[1].slice(0,2);var aMeridiem=aTime.split(":")[1].slice(-2,aTime.split(":")[1].length),bMeridiem=bTime.split(":")[1].slice(-2,bTime.split(":")[1].length);if(aHour>0&&aHour<12&&aMeridiem==="PM")aHour+=12;if(bHour>0&&bHour<12&&bMeridiem==="PM")bHour+=12;if(aHour<bHour)return-1;if(aHour>bHour)return 1;if(aHour===bHour){if(aMins<bMins)return-1;if(aMins>bMins)return 1;}return 0;}
